member.name: T:XmlToMarkdown.XmlToMarkdown
member.summary: This class supports the conversion of C# generated document to Markdown.

member.name: M:XmlToMarkdown.XmlToMarkdown.IsNamespaceDocElement(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: This method determines if the specified element is a NamespaceDoc class.
member.param: This is the element to check.
member.returns: true if the specified element is a NamespaceDoc class; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:XmlToMarkdown.XmlToMarkdown.ToCodeBlock(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts an >example< string into a Markdown code block.
member.param: This is the string contains the code.
